segments.text: The channel boats are quite fast , aren't they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , very . They make the trip in about an hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope we shan't have a rough passage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I hope not . I want to have a deck chair and enjoy the crossing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The sea seems quite calm , so there will be no fear of seasickness . Are you seasick ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , unfortunately . I'm very much subject to it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not a very good sailor , either . My mother is a dreadfully poor sailor . In fact , she never takes a voyage unless she has to . I am better than that , and even on the Pacific . after ten days of it , I can still find my sea legs . Well , happily we shall have a smooth passage today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , this little boat gets up a fine speed , and I think we'll soon get to the land .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I am of the same opinion .
segments.speaker: S2
